lesson_list.title: Hiragana - あ、い、う、え、お
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the basic vowel sounds in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - か、き、く、け、こ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (K) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - さ、し、す、せ、そ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (S) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - た、ち、つ、て、と
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (T) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - な、に、ぬ、ね、の
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (N) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - は、ひ、ふ、へ、ほ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (H) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - ま、み、む、め、も
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (M) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - や、ゆ、よ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (Y) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - ら、り、る、れ、ろ
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the consonant (R) in the Japanese language.

lesson_list.title: Hiragana - わ、を、ん
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the particle (W), and (N) sound in the Japanese language.
